job description:
Decision Scientist
Located in Silicon Valley, CA. If you are a decision scientist with experience in SQL, Tableau and Python/R, please read on!
Top Reasons to Work with Us
Cool company in business analytics that offers the latest technology to help you grow your professional skill-set
What You Will Be Doing
Selecting and integrating any Big Data tools and frameworks required to provide requested capabilities
Implementing ETL process
Monitoring performance and advising any necessary infrastructure changes
Defining data retention policies
What You Need for this Position
SQL,Python/R & Tableau, A/B Testing , Survey Analysis , Campaign Analytics Expert:
-Experienced with regression modeling techniques
-Should own and drive the analysis
-Knows SQL, R, Tableau etc.
-Provide actionable recommendation on marketing optimizations
-Experience working with multiple stakeholders, and should be able to present insights to leadership
What's In It for You
Enormous growth opportunities. We're actively hiring!
So, if you are a decision scientist with experience, please apply today!
-

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.



CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
